Some photos

Modal gallery

These are photos I took. An (M) indicates that the photos was taken on my mobile phone (Redmi 4), a (D) indicates that it was taken on a Nikon 3500 DSLR camera, and (E) indicates that the photo was edited. At the present time I do not know how to properly edit photos, so when I say edited, it refers to the options that my phone has : brightness, sharpness and contrast; and these apply only to the photos taken on my phone.
